quote1.title: “No more battles with our character sheets!”
quote1.intro: Many players said it: physical coins change everything.
quote1.p1: Gone are the columns of numbers hastily scribbled on a crumpled sheet. Now every player felt the real weight of the loot, sliding between their fingers like a forgotten heirloom. Treasure became tangible. At each exchange, the whole body reacted: the hand hesitating, the eye weighing, the throat drying. The hoard took on flesh. It became dramatic stakes, visceral emotion, an event, a lasting memory...
quote1.p2strong: No more fights with character sheets
quote1.p2rest: endless book searches while others disconnect, or the long 0 / 0.1 / 0.2 / 0.3... character creation sessions that discourage before the game even begins. With Geek & Dragon, everything starts when the coin hits the table.
